pkgmetadata.longdescription: HappyBase=========**HappyBase** is a developer-friendly Python_ library to interact with ApacheHBase_.* `Documentation <https://happybase.readthedocs.io/>`_ (Read the Docs)* `Downloads <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/happybase/>`_ (PyPI)* `Source code <https://github.com/wbolster/happybase>`_ (Github).. _Python: http://python.org/.. _HBase: http://hbase.apache.org/.. If you're reading this from the README.rst file in a source tree, you can generate the HTML documentation by running "make doc" and browsing to doc/build/html/index.html to see the result.
